metadata.title: What Will Happen To Microstrategy If Bitcoin Falls Under $74,000?
metadata.description: MicroStrategy is still the biggest corporate holder of Bitcoin, sitting on roughly 649,870 BTC as of mid-November 2025. They bought all of this for around 48.37 billion dollars total, which puts their average cost at about 74,433 dollars per Bitcoin. With Bitcoin dipping under 80k, things are starting to look ...
